images.copyright: Hoodoos at Bryce Canyon National Park, Utah (© Piriya Photography/Getty Images)
images.title: A huddle of hoodoos
images.caption: Bryce Canyon National Park turns 100
images.desc: As the sun rises on Bryce Canyon, its snow-capped red rock formations start to glow. These slender towers are called hoodoos, and Bryce Canyon National Park has the highest concentration of them anywhere on Earth.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
